name: grading-agent minimal (dotnet8 + jdk21 + maven)
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'set -e; echo "== Tool versions =="; dotnet --info | head -n 20; java -version; mvn -v; echo "== Docker guardrails smoke =="; docker --version >/dev/null 2>&1 && docker run --rm --network=none alpine:3.20 sh -c "id -u; (wget -qO- http://example.com || echo no-network)" || echo "(docker not available in container; skipping)"'
